pull.title: Scripts and tools: fix gitian-build.py --verify option
pull.body:
The [`gitian-builder/bin/gverify`](https://github.com/devrandom/gitian-builder/blob/master/bin/gverify) script returns the exit code 1 if a signature verification ends with 'BAD SIGNATURE' or 'MISMATCH' by design.
In these cases `check_call()` will raise `CalledProcessError` and `gitian-build.py --verify` will fail.

fix --verify option

The `gitian-builder/bin/gverify` script returns the exit code 1 if a signature verification ends with 'BAD SIGNATURE' or 'MISMATCH' by design.
In these cases `check_call()` will raise `CalledProcessError` and `gitian-build.py --verify` will fail.

events.message:
fix --verify option

The `gitian-builder/bin/gverify` script returns the exit code 1 if a signature verification ends with 'BAD SIGNATURE' or 'MISMATCH' by design.
In these cases `check_call()` will raise `CalledProcessError` and `gitian-build.py --verify` will fail.
